summary: Completed comprehensive e2e testing of Eden Claims Management app. Backend APIs (21/21 tests passed) and frontend integration working well. Found 1 critical bug: ClaimDetails component still uses mockData instead of real API.

ui_bugs.issue: Component uses mockClaims from mockData.js instead of fetching from real API. After creating a claim via UI, redirects to claim detail page but shows 'Claim not found' because it looks for claim in mock data, not database.

integration_issues.issue: Claim is created successfully in database but ClaimDetails page cannot display it because it reads from mockData instead of API

action_items: CRITICAL: Update ClaimDetails.jsx to fetch claim data from API using ApiService.getClaim(claimId) instead of mockClaims
Update ClaimDetails.jsx to fetch notes from API using ApiService.getClaimNotes(claimId) instead of mockNotes
Update ClaimDetails.jsx to fetch documents from API using ApiService.getClaimDocuments(claimId) instead of mockDocuments
critical_code_review_comments: ClaimDetails.jsx (line 7-8, 16-19): Still imports and uses mockClaims, mockNotes, mockDocuments, mockInspections from mockData.js - needs to be converted to use ApiService like Dashboard and ClaimsList components
ClaimDetails.jsx uses camelCase property names (clientName, dateOfLoss) but API returns snake_case (client_name, date_of_loss) - will need property mapping when converting to API

success_rate.frontend: 85% (Login, Register, Dashboard, ClaimsList, NewClaim work; ClaimDetails broken)

seed_data_creation: Created test claims via API and UI during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Backend APIs fully working. Frontend Dashboard, ClaimsList, NewClaim, Login, Register all integrated with real API. ClaimDetails.jsx is the only component still using mock data - needs to be updated to use ApiService. Property names in API are snake_case (client_name) but ClaimDetails expects camelCase (clientName).

backend.auth_me: PASS - Returns user info with valid token
backend.claims_get_single: PASS - Returns single claim by ID

frontend.login_flow: PASS - Redirects to dashboard after login
frontend.register_flow: PASS - Creates account and redirects to dashboard
frontend.dashboard: PASS - Shows real claims data from API
frontend.claims_list: PASS - Shows claims from database with filters
frontend.claim_details: FAIL - Uses mock data instead of API
